rows.label: tlk70000026_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Since ancient times, Iira has always
had the blessing of the Divine Beast and
lived in peace and prosperity.

rows.label: tlk70000026_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Whatever happened, we've always been
able to overcome it with the Divine Beast by
our side, right?

rows.label: tlk70000026_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, this isn't official, but rumor has it
we're building a powerful cutting-edge
warship - and it's nearly done.

rows.label: tlk70000026_05_msg0004
rows.name:
So I think this time too we'll be fine,
as long as we stick together.
